title: Perfect Two - Novel Updates
tags: Hiding True Identity   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Past Plays a Big Role   Poor Protagonist   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Showbiz   Slow Romance   Stalkers   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Younger Love Interests
author: 芒梨
description:
Cheng Xirong died accidentally while filming a blast scene. Unexpectedly, he was reborn. Although he was not satisfied with his new body and identity, he found it acceptable because he had a huge film fan with him from his previous life. That guy could write scripts, direct movies, run errands for him and cook for him.

Cheng Xirong asked, 'How much do you like your idol?'

Fu Zhou answered, 'I like him a lot more than you.'

Cheng Xurong said, 'Actually I'm your idol.'

Fu Zhou said, '...I'll give you whatever you want.'>
